message.content:
cs.GT, cs.DC, cs.CE, cs.NI, cs.SY

Reasoning: 
- cs.GT (Game Theory): The paper proposes a distributed algorithm using a group formation game to determine which users and providers will trade resources by their cooperative decisions. 
- cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing): The proposed auction system is designed for cloud instance market, which is a distributed computing environment. 
- cs.CE (Computational Engineering, Finance, and Science): The paper formulates the utility optimization problem as a binary integer programming problem and proposes a heuristic algorithm to obtain a nearly optimal solution. 
- cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture): The paper focuses on the efficient allocation of cloud-based Internet applications. 
- cs.SY (Systems and Control): The proposed auction system aims to assist cloud users and providers to decide when and how providers allocate their resources to which users, which involves resource and cost management.
